solution_line_template: Tony got {num_degrees_initial} degrees which each took {years_per_degree} years, for {num_degrees_initial}*{years_per_degree}=<<{num_degrees_initial}*{years_per_degree}={years_for_initial_degrees}>>{years_for_initial_degrees} years spent.

He then got his graduate degree, which was another {years_for_graduate_degree} years added to the previous total, for {years_for_initial_degrees}+{years_for_graduate_degree}=<<{years_for_initial_degrees}+{years_for_graduate_degree}={total_years_school}>>{total_years_school} years in total.
